Articles.Content: Netflix has officially picked up its Scott Pilgrim anime series based on Bryan Lee OMalley and BenDavid Grabinskis graphic novel series. The entire cast of Edgar Wrights 2010 film, Scott Pilgrim vs. … [+2640 chars]
